args:
Given this political fundraising email, respond with the name of the committee in the disclaimer that begins with Paid for by but does not include Paid for by, the committee address or the treasurer name. If no committee is present, return "None". Do not include any other text, no yapping.
name: Jeremy Shaffer
email: info@voteshaffer.com
subject: 4 Days Left and lots more to do!
body: ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ View thisemail in your browser (https://mailchi.mp/a211ea079d29/im-running-and-i-need-your-support-12716613?e=8c80cba7e7) https://secure.winred.com/friends-of-jeremy-shaffer-42e7f3c5/website?utm_medium=emailit&utm;_campaign=20241101_nv1&utm;_source=mc&utm;_content=saDear , The weather might beg to differ, but November is here and election dayis just 4 days away. Exercising your right to vote is the cornerstone of ourdemocracy, and being involved in the democratic process at every level isequally important. I know your contributions to this election extend farbeyond just casting a ballot, which is why I want to extend my heartfeltgratitude to all the volunteers, supporters, and donors who have powered ourcampaign. To put all this hard work into perspective, just last week, Idelivered over 7,000 handwritten postcards to the post office, and in total,our campaign has sent out more than 50,000 hand-addressed letters andpostcards. Reflecting back, I am truly inspired by the remarkable supportwe’ve received from Republicans, Democrats, and Independents as I seek torepresent all of us in District 28. https://secure.winred.com/friends-of-jeremy-shaffer-42e7f3c5/website?utm_medium=emailit&utm;_campaign=20241101_nv1&utm;_source=mc&utm;_content=saHave A Plan To Vote Be sure to verify your polling location by clicking thebutton below. If you have a completed mail in ballot be sure you deliver it tothe County Office Building (542 Forbes Ave, Pittsburgh, PA 15219) before 8:00PM on November 5th. POLL FINDER(https://www.pavoterservices.pa.gov/Pages/PollingPlaceInfo.aspx) Help onElection Day We have 26 polling locations open for 13 hours each day (from 7AM to 8 PM). If you can spare a few hours to distribute campaign information,please reply to this email, and we’ll coordinate a convenient time and placefor you. https://secure.winred.com/friends-of-jeremy-shaffer-42e7f3c5/website?utm_medium=emailit&utm;_campaign=20241101_nv1&utm;_source=mc&utm;_content=saPick Up Your Election Day Supplies If you’ve signed up to assist on ElectionDay, please stop by the Republican office to collect your instructions,supplies, and a Shaffer T-shirt. Our office is located at 120 Church Rd,Wexford, PA 15090, and will be open during the following hours: ● Friday(11/1): 3 PM - 6 PM ● Saturday (11/2): 1 PM - 9 PM ● Sunday (11/3): 2 PM - 9PM ● Monday (11/4): 11 AM - 8 PM If you are unable to pick up your items,we’re happy to deliver them to you. Just call or text Connor McDonald at724-355-2045. Election Night Celebration: Join us for our Election Night Partyat the North Park Clubhouse, starting at 8:30 PM after the polls close onTuesday. The clubhouse is located on Route 8, across from Richland Mall (nearShop ‘N Save/Kohl’s) at 5301 Ranalli Rd, Gibsonia, PA 15044. If you plan toattend, please reply to this email to assist us with our planning.https://secure.winred.com/friends-of-jeremy-shaffer-42e7f3c5/website?utm_medium=emailit&utm;_campaign=20241101_nv1&utm;_source=mc&utm;_content=saThank you once again for your incredible support. Let’s make these final dayscount! To Victory, https://secure.winred.com/friends-of-jeremy-shaffer-42e7f3c5/website?utm_medium=emailit&utm;_campaign=20240924_weeks&utm;_source=mc&utm;_content=saJeremy Shaffer DONATE (https://secure.winred.com/friends-of-jeremy-shaffer-42e7f3c5/website?utm_medium=emailit&utm;_campaign=20241101_nv1&utm;_source=mc&utm;_content=sa)https://www.facebook.com/shaffer4pa/ mailto:Shaffer4PA@gmail.comhttps://www.voteshaffer.com/ https://twitter.com/voteshafferpa Copyright ©2024 Friends of Jeremy Shaffer. All rights reserved. You are receiving thisemail because you are a valued supporter of Jeremy Shaffer. Paid for byFriends of Jeremy Shaffer P.O. Box 391 ● Gibsonia, PA 15044 ● (412) 837-9565Want to change how you receive these emails? You can update your preferences(https://voteshaffer.us21.list-manage.com/profile?u=5a4998b6ce4b01517c474232e&id;=47b192f59b&e;=8c80cba7e7&c;=874b693de3)or unsubscribe (https://voteshaffer.us21.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=5a4998b6ce4b01517c474232e&id;=47b192f59b&t;=b&e;=8c80cba7e7&c;=874b693de3)
